• Default Dribbble Tags

    In the Dribbble preferences, default tags can now be specified. The information view will auto-fill with these tags. If "Add Shot Information" is disabled these tags will be automaticly added to the shot.

  • Coaches Loupe Tag

    There is now a preference to allow shots to be tagged with "coaches loupe". Shots tagged as such will be featured on coachesloupe.com.

  • Big Move

    The loupe can now be moved 10 pixels using the hotkeys cmd+shift+arrow keys.
